name: Greenhouse Recruiting
description: Integrate with Greenhouse Recruiting to list, get, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Candidates
tools.description: List candidates from Greenhouse. Returns candidate names, emails, and application info.

tools.name: Get Candidate
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific Greenhouse candidate by their ID.

tools.name: List Jobs
tools.description: List jobs from Greenhouse. Returns job titles, departments, offices, and status.

tools.name: List Applications
tools.description: List applications from Greenhouse. Returns application status, candidate info, and job associations.

tools.name: Add Note
tools.description: Add a note to a candidate in Greenhouse. Notes are visible to the hiring team on the candidate profile.
